participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Evelyn is adventurous and laid-back, with a passion for nature and a love for music.
participant_1.background: I grew up in the country, where there was plenty of land to grow sunflowers. I work at a coffee house. I am in the navy. I play the harmonica in my spare time. I like skateboarding.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: David is determined and introspective, with a strong commitment to fitness and creativity.
participant_2.background: I'm a powerlifter who loves the cold, but I'm not sure I could be a professional if I were blind. I write poems about my life and my culture. My favorite show is CSI. I am buying a house. I want to learn how to be more assertive in my business.

content.text: Hi there! How are you today?
I am doing well! Thank you for asking! How are you today?
I'm doing well too! Thanks for asking. I just got back from work. How was your day?
My day was pretty good. I went to the gym and lifted weights. I'm a powerlifter.
Oh wow, that's awesome! I've never been to the gym before. I'm more of a nature person. I grew up in the country.
I can relate to that. I love the outdoors too. I do most of my writing outside. I'm a poet.
That's really cool! I've never met a poet before. I love reading poems.
Thanks! I love reading poems too. I write poems about my life and my culture.
That's really cool! I'm from a small town in the Midwest. What's your culture?
I'm from the Navajo Nation. I'm Navajo.
Oh wow, that's really cool! I've never met a Navajo person before.
Thanks! I'm happy to meet you
